channel.title: Projects on DjPM
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on DjPM

item.title: Quant
item.description: Quantitative models for financial market forecasting, both known methods and custom built analysis on several different markets spanning stocks, commodities, derivatives and bonds (constantly updated).

item.title: Spot a Knot
item.description: Spot a Knot game for teaching the difficulty in discerning topological objects (specifically knots) from one another for the general public.

item.title: 3D Smectic Liquid Crystals
item.description: During the summer of 2023 I was funded to work on a project concerning the development of 3D smectic liquid crystal simulation in C++ and Python. My work concerned developing methods to constrain tensors to physically realizable states using lagrangian multipliers.
